label: Gemini by Google
description: Gemini is a powerful AI assistant that can help with tasks, provide information, and generate creative content across various formats.

label: Perplexity (Private Company)
description: An AI search engine that provides answers with sources (conversational).

label: ChatGPT by OpenAI
description: An AI chatbot that generates human-like text, answers questions, and performs tasks.

label: Copilot by Microsoft
description: An AI assistant that helps with tasks like coding, writing, and summarizing.

label: Claude by Anthropic
description: An AI assistant to help with tasks like writing, summarizing, and answering questions.

label: Meta by Facebook
description: An AI for personalized content recommendations, image and video generation.

label: Pi by Inflection AI
description: An empathetic personal AI assistant that learns and chats.

label: MiniPerplx by independent creators
description: A minimalistic AI search engine designed to deliver answers in the simplest and most elegant way possible.

label: ChatGPT Free Online by ChatGPT 4 Online
description: A powerful AI tool by ChatGPT 4 Online that uses the capabilities of natural language processing (NLP).

label: Poe  by Quora
description: An online platform that allows users to interact with various AI chatbots, including popular ones like ChatGPT, Gemini, and Claude.
